donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: Enhanced capacity of parliamentarians to carry out their core legislative, oversight and representation functions, particularly civilian oversight of the security sector

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: The Project builds on the first phase of the District Based Peace Building Project (DBPB) and the Community Based Peace Support Project (CBPS) in South Central Somalia with particular focus on implementing local peace building initiatives and strengthening the ability of local government and communities to respond to crisis and overcome the recovery challenges.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: The Somali Constitution Making Support Project aims at promoting reconciliation, peace and stability through a constitution-making process at the federal level in line with the Transitional Federal Charter (TFC). The project supports institutional machinery and representative mechanisms, encourages societal dialogue on constitutional issues and participation in the constitution - making process.
